ISSUE.TITLE: Add expiration_time parameter for update group
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi @bbernhard, thanks so much for the library! Just started integrating this in on a web app and one of the feature we'd like is to: set disappearing message timer for an existing group. I see you recently added this on the [create group endpoint](https://github.com/bbernhard/signal-cli-rest-api/commit/94e93cbe3531e41378f912823f1ad1bbe186c983) and was wondering if you're planning to implement the same for update group?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: GET groups endpoint: return uuid instead of number in case no number is set see #611

COMMIT.MESSAGE: added expiration_time to Update Groups endpoint see #616
